Rowwise and Columnwise Statistics

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/statistics.R
statistics.Rd

Computes statistics over DataMatrix margins.

rowAll(x, ...)

colAll(x, ...)

rowAny(x, ...)

colAny(x, ...)

rowQuantiles(x, ...)

colQuantiles(x, ...)

rowRanges(x, ...)

colRanges(x, ...)

rowRanks(x, ...)

colRanks(x, ...)

rowVars(x, ...)

colVars(x, ...)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
rowQuantiles(
  x,
  probs = seq(0, 1, 0.25),
  na.rm = FALSE,
  names = TRUE,
  type = 7,
  ...
)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
colQuantiles(
  x,
  probs = seq(0, 1, 0.25),
  na.rm = FALSE,
  names = TRUE,
  type = 7,
  ...
)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
rowMeans(x, na.rm = FALSE)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
colMeans(x, na.rm = FALSE)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
rowRanges(x, na.rm = FALSE)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
colRanges(x, na.rm = FALSE)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
rowSums(x, na.rm = FALSE)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
colSums(x, na.rm = FALSE)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
rowVars(x, na.rm = FALSE)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
colVars(x, na.rm = FALSE)

Arguments

x

A DataMatrix object.
...

Further parameters to be passed to other methods.
probs, names, type

See quantile.
na.rm

A logical scalar: should missing values (including NaN) be omitted from the calculations?

Details

rowQuantiles and colQuantiles

Form row and column quantiles.

rowMeans and colMeans

Form row and column means.

rowRanges and colRanges

Form row and column ranges.

rowRanks and colRanks

rowSums and colSums

Form row and column sums.

rowVars and colVars

Form row and column variances.

Examples

## Create count data matrix
A <- CountMatrix(data = sample(0:10, 100, TRUE), nrow = 20, ncol = 5)

rowAll(A, f = is_odd)
#>  row1  row2  row3  row4  row5  row6  row7  row8  row9 row10 row11 row12 row13 
#> FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE 
#> row14 row15 row16 row17 row18 row19 row20 
#> FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE 
rowAny(A, f = is_odd)
#>  row1  row2  row3  row4  row5  row6  row7  row8  row9 row10 row11 row12 row13 
#>  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE 
#> row14 row15 row16 row17 row18 row19 row20 
#>  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE 

## Row and column quantiles
rowQuantiles(A, probs = c(0.25, 0.50, 0.75))
#>     row1 row2 row3 row4 row5 row6 row7 row8 row9 row10 row11 row12 row13 row14
#> 25%    3    0    2    5    1    2    3    4    1     4     3     1     3     2
#> 50%    6    7    3    6    8    7    6    4    3     7     6     8     6     4
#> 75%    9    8    5    6    9    8    8    8    6     8     9     8     7     5
#>     row15 row16 row17 row18 row19 row20
#> 25%     2     2     5     6     8     4
#> 50%     6     6     5     7     9     6
#> 75%     6     6     7     7    10    10
colQuantiles(A, probs = c(0.25, 0.50, 0.75))
#>     col1 col2 col3 col4 col5
#> 25%    1 2.75 5.00 3.00 2.75
#> 50%    6 4.00 6.50 6.00 6.00
#> 75%    8 7.25 8.25 8.25 7.25

## Row and column means
rowMeans(A)
#>  row1  row2  row3  row4  row5  row6  row7  row8  row9 row10 row11 row12 row13 
#>   6.2   5.0   3.2   5.0   5.6   5.4   5.4   4.8   3.2   5.6   6.0   5.4   5.4 
#> row14 row15 row16 row17 row18 row19 row20 
#>   4.6   4.6   4.2   5.0   6.6   8.0   6.6 
colMeans(A)
#> col1 col2 col3 col4 col5 
#> 4.75 4.65 6.30 5.60 5.15 

## Row and column ranges
rowRanges(A)
#>      row1 row2 row3 row4 row5 row6 row7 row8 row9 row10 row11 row12 row13 row14
#> [1,]    3    0    0    0    0    0    1    0    0     1     3     0     3     2
#> [2,]   10   10    6    8   10   10    9    8    6     8     9    10     8    10
#>      row15 row16 row17 row18 row19 row20
#> [1,]     0     0     0     3     3     3
#> [2,]     9     7     8    10    10    10
colRanges(A)
#>      col1 col2 col3 col4 col5
#> [1,]    0    0    0    0    0
#> [2,]   10   10   10   10   10

## Row and column sums
rowSums(A)
#>  row1  row2  row3  row4  row5  row6  row7  row8  row9 row10 row11 row12 row13 
#>    31    25    16    25    28    27    27    24    16    28    30    27    27 
#> row14 row15 row16 row17 row18 row19 row20 
#>    23    23    21    25    33    40    33 
colSums(A)
#> col1 col2 col3 col4 col5 
#>   95   93  126  112  103 

## Row and column variances
rowVars(A)
#>  row1  row2  row3  row4  row5  row6  row7  row8  row9 row10 row11 row12 row13 
#>  10.7  22.0   5.7   9.0  22.3  17.8  11.3  11.2   7.7   9.3   9.0  20.8   5.3 
#> row14 row15 row16 row17 row18 row19 row20 
#>  10.8  12.8   9.2   9.5   6.3   8.5  10.8 
colVars(A)
#>      col1      col2      col3      col4      col5 
#> 13.250000  9.397368  8.536842 11.936842  9.607895
